title: Bi-Weekly Gaming Discussion Thread
selftext:
What are you playing, r/India? Let us use this thread to discuss any games you're playing, have played or are going to play. (Mobile and board games included!)

What game are you looking forward to? Are you a developer? Show us your wares!

Please don't just list the names of games, make sure to write a word or two about them as well.

Check out r/IndianGaming! They are an active community and also host a few co-op sessions.

**Gaming Thread is posted every two weeks on Tuesday mornings |** [**Old Threads**](https://reddit.com/r/india/search?q=Bi-Weekly+Gaming+Discussion+Thread&restrict_sr=on&sort=new&t=all)

https://preview.redd.it/xagdqefyv8n61.png?width=1487&format=png&auto=webp&s=f975f1c3093a3d9598a1da39854b03d1250bd55d
comments:
Finished RDR2, which took me 3 months a week ago and then finished stray in 2 days. Both of them were amazing. RDR2 probably one of my favorite games ever now.

Going to start Sifu now. Also playing Stanley parable ultra deluxe on the side
put a dating thread too man XD
APEX and Valorant are my current go to games
im currently playing  Call of duty:mobile

If anyone is a fan of the Half Life and Portal franchise, I implore you to play Entropy : Zero 2 on Steam. It's a very high quality mod and is free to play. The quality of the game play and writing is definitely up there, even better than Half Life 2 : Episode 1 in my books.

Don't get frustrated and give up on Sifu, stick with it till the end, it's amazing. 

Also, try not to die in the first two levels at all. Atleast before the 2nd level's boss

Gaming does not feel as fun anymore to me.
Growing up makes you boring I guess.

Anyway, I am an avid Apex player.
If there’s someone who’d like to play, hmu.

I am playing Identity V and Genshin Impact. 

The first is a Dead by Daylight like asymmetrical game, but a lot less scary and much more competitive. I am excited for an upcoming skin for the Indian cricketer character. His name is Ganji Gupta and he is a very strong and highly loved and frequently played character which makes me proud. He is based off of Aamir Khan's character in Lagaan.

Genshin Impact is a very popular single player free to play open world adventure game. Recently, they released a new region based on India called Sumeru (also based on Persia and Arabia, but the current past that is released is the Indian inspired one). They added some well known dishes such as Pani Puri, Butter Chicken and Biriyani. It's very exciting to explore.

Both games can be played on PC and mobile.

Holy shit, this looks really damm cool. A question if you don't mind me asking, how do you guys find out such cool games on steam ? this one totally flew under my radar and im very active on steam. Also if you like half life and deus ex then check out this game called E.Y.E. divine cybermancy. Its a little weird game, super janky and certainly not for everyone but if it clicks then its quite fun.

Horizon zero dawn on pc game is awesome
,Hope Sony also releases forbidden west on pc

Marvel Spiderman Remastered, Warframe, No Mans Sky, NITE Team 4, Grey\_Hack, GRIME, God of War, Star Wars Jedi - Fallen Order, Scarlet Nexus, Sifu, Ghostwire - Tokyo, DOOM - Eternal, DMC5, Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts 2. Most of these games are played across the week.

I just came across it on the Steam top sellers list and saw that it had overwhelmingly positive reviews. Was a bit unsure about downloading it at first because I've not had a great experience with mods outside of  checking out stuff that looked cool, but this one completely surprised me. I can't believe that a mod that has 8 hours of game play, original writing, music and voice acting is FREE.
